title: Specifying multiple input files in radare2
content:
If I want to pass several inputs, I know that I can write this with rarun2: 
#!/usr/bin/rarun2
stdin="first
second
"
But what if I want to pass the input from a file 
file1
at the first time the program is waiting for an input, then from a file 
file2
? Is there a way to do this?
